  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AABB
    A axis-aligned bounding box.
    AABBTest
    Test class for AABB
    Circle
    A circle shape.
    CircleTest
    Test class for Circle

    A k-discrete oriented polytope.
    KDOPTest
    Test class for KDOP
    OBB
    A oriented bounding box.
    OBBTest
    Test class for OBB

    A point shape.
    PointTest
    Test class for Point
    Position
    Representation of the position of a shape by it leftmost point and topmost point.

    Test class for Position
    Shape
    Abstract class for the representation of 2D shapes.
